Text.val: 20.03.2013 JH SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
30.11.2012 JH SCR17751 Extended length of virtual used in DB SQL box to 255
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
27.09.2011 GB SCR16685 Changed width of columns INVO_INVOICENO
28.07.2011 SH SCR16635 Extended entry of invoice number to alpha 20
13.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Removed GNRL_CURRENCY (was not used)
It is not allowed to select invoices where INVO_PAYMENCODE > 0
This program is made from a copy of the program ODC005D.
The functionality has been limited to only select invoice from client debtor
the copy made according to SCR #8845 in order to avoid making the original
program too complicated and non maintainable
security check - inherit Authorisation from OSP300A
If the user press on the OK button no action has to be taken
The result of the selection sitting already in the MULT selection table
create record in TEMP if invoice is selected
delete record in TEMP, if delete selection
